attributes.action: Demand the immediate resignation of the Health Secretary Jeremy Hunt
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt should be forced to resign his post as Health Secretary as he has categorically failed to understand the position of junior doctors in this dispute, and is a threat to the future of the NHS. As well as commanding no confidence or respect from the industry, or the country, at large.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
